highlights: Delivered key features to launch the Fey app. As part of a small remote team, ownership and shipping fast was highly valued
Reverse-engineered and built complete integration with the Robinhood API, allowing the company to capitalize on a huge pool of customers
Fully designed and implemented the backend for the Research part of the app
Enabled revenue by building user account subscriptions with the Stripe API
Led the GCP migration of high-traffic distributed systems, such as price forecasting and user tracking, with zero production downtime
Slashed payment processing costs by up to 10% via smarter payment routing strategies
Democratized ETL contributions across engineering and data science through reusable and performant data processing jobs
Drastically grew data-driven decision making by integrating realtime user events into Amplitude for self-serve analytics
Improved data reliability by co-developing a type-safe, idempotent, and scalable tracking events system. Presented demos, documentation, and gathered feedback to increase adoption

education.area: Bachelor of Computer Science Co-op, Honours
